products.description: A French pastry made with choux pastry dough, filled with cream and topped with chocolate icing. Often served as a dessert.
A sweet pastry made with cinnamon, sugar, and butter, rolled into a spiral shape and topped with cream cheese frosting. A popular breakfast or brunch item.
A pastry filled with cooked apples, cinnamon, and sugar, then baked until golden brown. Often served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
A French pastry made with laminated dough and filled with chocolate. Similar to a croissant, but with a chocolate filling instead of plain butter.
A flaky, buttery pastry that is perfect for breakfast or a mid-day snack. Often served plain or with fillings such as chocolate or almond paste.
Freshly brewed coffee made from high-quality beans. Served hot or cold.
Espresso mixed with steamed milk and a small layer of frothed milk on top. Can be flavored with syrups like vanilla or caramel.
Espresso mixed with equal parts steamed milk and frothed milk. Often dusted with cocoa powder on top.
A rich, creamy chocolate drink made with milk, cocoa powder, and sugar. Often topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.
A hot or cold beverage made from steeped tea leaves. Can be served plain or with milk and sweetener.
